divs: Sighting DetailsAFTER OBSERVING THE UFO ABOVE MY POWER PLANT FOR ABOUT 5 MIN IT TOOK OFF WITHOUT ANY NOISE. I CONTACTED THE SEARCH RADAR PEOPLE AND THEY TRACKED IT ESTIMATED SPEED 24,000 MPH WITH IN EARTHS ATMOSPHERE.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Point Arena
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I WAS ON A EARLY WARNING RADAR SITE 150 MILES NORTH OF SAN FRANSISCO I WAS CONTACTED BY MCC RADAR SECTION, WENT OUT SIDE OF MY POWER PLANT AND OBSERVED IT HOVERINFG ABOVE MY GAS TURBINE POWER PLANE
